      • debugMapping

        public boolean debugMapping()
        Method for debugging purposes. Here the concept of restMapping validation is shown. It is important to check, if all annotations are correct and consistent. Otherwise the service will not be accessible by the WebConnector. Best to do it in the unit tests. To avoid being overlooked/ignored the method is implemented here and not in the test section.
        Returns:
        true, if mapping correct

      • getRESTMapping

        public java.lang.String getRESTMapping()
        This method is needed for every RESTful application in LAS2peer. There is no need to change!
        Returns:
        the mapping
